bibl.title: Hellenistic Phoenicia.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The Time of Troubles, 360-287 BC. - 2. The Ptolemaic Peace, 287-225 BC. - 3. Conquest, 225-193 BC. - 4. The Seleukid Peace, 193-129 BC. - 5. Autonomy and Independence, 129-64 BC. - 6. The Roman Take-over, 64-15 BC. - 7. Phoenicians Overseas. - Index.
bibl.seg: Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1991, 8°, ix-228 pp., 7 cartes. ISBN 0-19-814770-8. £30/$55.

Introduction. - 1. The Time of Troubles, 360-287 BC. - 2. The Ptolemaic Peace, 287-225 BC. - 3. Conquest, 225-193 BC. - 4. The Seleukid Peace, 193-129 BC. - 5. Autonomy and Independence, 129-64 BC. - 6. The Roman Take-over, 64-15 BC. - 7. Phoenicians Overseas. - Index.
